entries.name: Rhea Crossland
entries.title: Smoke on the ridge
entries.contentHtml: Northern horizon burned all night. We counted six impacts. Supplies low, morale thinner.

entries.name: Silas Wren
entries.title: Transit tunnel
entries.contentHtml: We reached the transit tunnel before dusk. The echo of footsteps follows us even when we stop.

entries.name: Mara Voss
entries.title: The water table
entries.contentHtml: Found a clean vein beneath the old courthouse. Trading two batteries for a filter.

entries.name: Rhea Crossland
entries.title: Last radio beacon
entries.contentHtml: Radio chatter says the coast is gone. We still keep watch for the southbound signal.
